extendedInfo.description: We just launched a NEW and IMPROVED app for your greedy consumption! Listen LIVE and share your favorite songs, check out Rock Girl, Games and More!We are Fort Wayne, Indiana Rock Station-98.9 The Bear - WBYR! Check out this Legendary Rock Radio Station and enjoy the TNT Morning Show with Turner and Barry Thickk, Jenna, John the Mexican, Drew Cage, Jerrdog and Stamos!

reviews.title: Always loading , UNINSTALLING NOW
reviews.comment: I\'ve NOT gotten any further than LOADING with this app. The other radio station in the same city, Ft. Wayne, IN ....also has an app set up EXACTLY like third one but....thank God that app loads immediately - Get your act together WBYR The Bear-- few whiz , I\'d be screwed if I didn\'t live with in stereo range....  rock on!
reviews.author: Nyree LewisRN

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: It sucks it wont let me do anything when i click on something it loads for ever and i have uninstall just to get it to stop tried 15 times which sucks because i really like the bear have been listing to them forever
reviews.author: Michael Hinrichs

reviews.title: Help plz
reviews.comment: I really want this to work. Everything works but when I hit play is say \"Starting Live Audio\" I see the music pop up on the bottom and in the Track Collection anyway of a fix plz
reviews.author: Jeremy Huntley

reviews.title: Eh, needs work.
reviews.comment: It freezes on babe of the day. I\'m uninstalling it, sorry.
reviews.author: Morgan Felkner

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Freezes every time I open it
reviews.author: Sydnie Wiggins

reviews.title: Best station ever
reviews.comment: I grew up on the bear, and I hope if I have kids they will too.
reviews.author: Everett Gilbert

reviews.title: Loading
reviews.comment: Loading....loading....loading....screw this, uninstall.
reviews.author: Sam Burgin

reviews.comment: Love the app
reviews.author: Zonia Prosser

reviews.title: Luv it!
reviews.comment: Since Chicago doesn\'t have any good stations anymore I\'ve been listening to this.  I love it! However.... It does turn off quite often which is frustrating.  If that could be fixed the app would be perfect.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the station, but...
reviews.comment: Love the station, but the app doesn\'t work on the LG Thrill....please make it work.  Tampa Florida\'s rock station sucks and I need some real rock music!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Best music list i\'ve heard in a while...keep up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: All the people that says this doesn\'t work get a 4G phone works perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: I guess this app doesn\'t like LG phones. Installed & continuously says \"starting live audio\" Uninstalling now :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Htc hero s
reviews.comment: Everything works great but needs new rock girl update! Still shows megan!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the radio station, however this app will play for a minute or so the stop.

reviews.title: Shittastic
reviews.comment: Epic fail. Will only play the advertising. Just like everything else the bear does this sucks.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: No good rock stations in north west indiana thank god for the bear. Great app

reviews.title: Needs a widget.
reviews.comment: The app is awesome. Just needs a widget to control the music player and show whats playing.

reviews.title: No music!
reviews.comment: Theirs no music. It takes several seconds after hitting the play button to finaly play...nothing. the two stars are only for the pics.

reviews.comment: One of the best apps out there. Love it
